enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve updating or initializing TLD-related arrays, which are crucial for the validation process in the getInstance method.
The getInstance method relies on the unicodeToASCII method to normalize domain names, ensuring consistent validation.
The isValid method is directly used by the getInstance method to validate domain names based on the initialized TLD arrays.
The isValidTld method is a key component in the validation process initiated by the getInstance method.
